overview: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

title: Amour
stars: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Emmanuelle Riva, Isabelle Huppert
overview: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

title: The Five-Year Engagement
stars: Jason Segel, Emily Blunt, Chris Pratt
overview: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.

title: The Devil's Rejects
stars: Sid Haig, Sheri Moon Zombie, Bill Moseley
overview: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

title: Collateral Beauty
stars: Will Smith, Edward Norton, Kate Winslet
overview: Retreating from life after a tragedy, a man questions the universe by writing to Love, Time, and Death. Receiving unexpected answers, he begins to see how these things interlock and how even loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.

title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
stars: Angelina Jolie, Elle Fanning, Harris Dickinson
overview: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies and dark new forces at play.

title: Letters to Juliet
stars: Amanda Seyfried, Gael García Bernal, Vanessa Redgrave
overview: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the "Secretaries of Juliet".

title: Only Lovers Left Alive
stars: Tilda Swinton, Tom Hiddleston, Mia Wasikowska
overview: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. Though their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

title: The Purge: Election Year
stars: Frank Grillo, Elizabeth Mitchell, Mykelti Williamson
overview: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

title: Drive Angry
stars: Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner
overview: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

title: Lockout
stars: Steve Saint Leger, Guy Pearce, Maggie Grace
overview: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.

title: The Core
stars: Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Delroy Lindo
overview: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

title: Anna Karenina
stars: Keira Knightley, Jude Law, Aaron Taylor-Johnson
overview: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

title: Ali
stars: Will Smith, Jamie Foxx, Jon Voight
overview: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

title: Un prophète
stars: Tahar Rahim, Niels Arestrup, Adel Bencherif
overview: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

title: The Guilty
stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Riley Keough, Peter Sarsgaard
overview: A demoted police officer assigned to a call dispatch desk is conflicted when he receives an emergency phone call from a kidnapped woman.

title: The Death of Stalin
stars: Steve Buscemi, Simon Russell Beale, Jeffrey Tambor
overview: Moscow, 1953. After being in power for nearly thirty years, Soviet dictator Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin takes ill and quickly dies. Now the members of the Council of Ministers scramble for power.

title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
stars: David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson
overview: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

title: Jobs
stars: Ashton Kutcher, Dermot Mulroney, Josh Gad
overview: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

title: Self/less
stars: Ryan Reynolds, Natalie Martinez, Matthew Goode
overview: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

title: That's My Boy
stars: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Leighton Meester
overview: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent until Todd's 18th birthday. Now Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding after years apart, sending the groom-to-be's world crashing down.

title: Sahara
stars: Matthew McConaughey, Penélope Cruz, Steve Zahn
overview: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

title: Year One
stars: Jack Black, Michael Cera, Olivia Wilde
overview: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

title: Splice
stars: Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley, Delphine Chanéac
overview: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

title: Saw 3D
stars: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Betsy Russell
overview: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

title: Demolition
stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts, Chris Cooper
overview: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

title: Intolerable Cruelty
stars: Ethan Coen, George Clooney, Catherine Zeta-Jones
overview: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

title: The Rite
stars: Colin O'Donoghue, Anthony Hopkins, Ciarán Hinds
overview: American seminary student Michael Kovak (Colin O'Donaghue) travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

title: Runaway Jury
stars: John Cusack, Rachel Weisz, Gene Hackman
overview: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

title: You're Next
stars: Sharni Vinson, Joe Swanberg, AJ Bowen
overview: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

title: The American
stars: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido
overview: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

title: Waiting...
stars: Ryan Reynolds, Anna Faris, John Francis Daley
overview: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

title: Bone Tomahawk
stars: Kurt Russell, Patrick Wilson, Matthew Fox
overview: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

title: Land of the Dead
stars: John Leguizamo, Asia Argento, Simon Baker
overview: The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

title: Reign Over Me
stars: Adam Sandler, Don Cheadle, Jada Pinkett Smith
overview: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

title: Babylon A.D.
stars: Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Mélanie Thierry
overview: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

title: Funny Games
stars: Naomi Watts, Tim Roth, Michael Pitt
overview: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

title: Meet the Robinsons
stars: Daniel Hansen, Wesley Singerman, Angela Bassett
overview: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

title: The Hunt
stars: Betty Gilpin, Hilary Swank, Ike Barinholtz
overview: Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.

title: The Ring Two
stars: Naomi Watts, David Dorfman, Sissy Spacek
overview: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

title: Overlord
stars: Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell, Mathilde Ollivier
overview: A small group of American soldiers find horror behind enemy lines on the eve of D-Day.

title: The International
stars: Clive Owen, Naomi Watts, Armin Mueller-Stahl
overview: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

title: I Love You Phillip Morris
stars: John Requa, Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor
overview: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

title: Eat Pray Love
stars: Julia Roberts, Javier Bardem, Richard Jenkins
overview: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

title: Another Earth
stars: Brit Marling, William Mapother, Matthew-Lee Erlbach
overview: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

title: Flickan som lekte med elden
stars: Noomi Rapace, Michael Nyqvist, Lena Endre
overview: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

title: Widows
stars: Viola Davis, Michelle Rodriguez, Elizabeth Debicki
overview: Four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities take fate into their own hands and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
stars: Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith
overview: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

title: Mr. Popper's Penguins
stars: Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino, Angela Lansbury
overview: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

title: The Hot Chick
stars: Rob Schneider, Rachel McAdams, Anna Faris
overview: An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

title: Sadak 2
stars: Priyanka Bose, Alia Bhatt, Sanjay Dutt
overview: The film picks up where Sadak left off, revolving around the journey with a young girl who becomes an important character in the life of the protagonist, and the reason for him to stay alive.

title: Revolver
stars: Jason Statham, Ray Liotta, André 3000
overview: Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.

title: Hustlers
stars: Constance Wu, Jennifer Lopez, Julia Stiles
overview: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

title: Paranormal Activity 3
stars: Ariel Schulman, Chloe Csengery, Jessica Tyler Brown
overview: In 1988, young sisters Katie and Kristi befriend an invisible entity who resides in their home.

title: A Good Year
stars: Russell Crowe, Abbie Cornish, Albert Finney
overview: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

title: A Cure for Wellness
stars: Dane DeHaan, Jason Isaacs, Mia Goth
overview: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

title: Bring It On
stars: Kirsten Dunst, Eliza Dushku, Jesse Bradford
overview: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
stars: Freddie Highmore, Sarah Bolger, David Strathairn
overview: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

title: Iron Sky
stars: Julia Dietze, Christopher Kirby, Götz Otto
overview: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

title: Edge of Darkness
stars: Mel Gibson, Ray Winstone, Danny Huston
overview: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the murder of his activist daughter, he uncovers a corporate cover-up and government conspiracy that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

title: Season of the Witch
stars: Nicolas Cage, Ron Perlman, Claire Foy
overview: Fourteenth century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

title: Das Experiment
stars: Moritz Bleibtreu, Christian Berkel, Oliver Stokowski
overview: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

title: Persepolis
stars: Marjane Satrapi, Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve
overview: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

title: Bedtime Stories
stars: Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Courteney Cox
overview: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

title: Open Season
stars: Jill Culton, Anthony Stacchi, Ashton Kutcher
overview: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

title: Bad Grandpa
stars: Johnny Knoxville, Jackson Nicoll, Gregorio
overview: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.

title: Hardcore Henry
stars: Sharlto Copley, Tim Roth, Haley Bennett
overview: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

title: Hereafter
stars: Matt Damon, Cécile de France, Bryce Dallas Howard
overview: A drama centered on three people - a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy - who are touched by death in different ways.

title: My Sister's Keeper
stars: Cameron Diaz, Abigail Breslin, Alec Baldwin
overview: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

title: The Pacifier
stars: Vin Diesel, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot
overview: Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

title: Turbo
stars: Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti, Maya Rudolph
overview: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

title: Rambo: Last Blood
stars: Sylvester Stallone, Paz Vega, Sergio Peris-Mencheta
overview: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

title: Concussion
stars: Will Smith, Alec Baldwin, Albert Brooks
overview: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

title: 3 Days to Kill
stars: Kevin Costner, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen
overview: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

title: Dead Silence
stars: Ryan Kwanten, Amber Valletta, Donnie Wahlberg
overview: A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a deceased ventriloquist.

title: The Painted Veil
stars: Naomi Watts, Edward Norton, Liev Schreiber
overview: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

stars: Chadwick Boseman, T.R. Knight, Harrison Ford
overview: In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
stars: Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
overview: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: The Road to El Dorado
stars: Don Paul, Jeffrey Katzenberg, Kevin Kline
overview: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: Brightburn
stars: Elizabeth Banks, David Denman, Jackson A. Dunn
overview: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

title: Dreamcatcher
stars: Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Jason Lee
overview: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

title: Angel Has Fallen
stars: Gerard Butler, Frederick Schmidt, Danny Huston
overview: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

title: The Neon Demon
stars: Elle Fanning, Christina Hendricks, Keanu Reeves
overview: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

title: Kynodontas
stars: Christos Stergioglou, Michele Valley, Angeliki Papoulia
overview: A controlling, manipulative father locks his three adult offspring in a state of perpetual childhood by keeping them prisoner within the sprawling family compound.

title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
stars: Michael Cera, Kat Dennings, Aaron Yoo
overview: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

title: Monsters
stars: Scoot McNairy, Whitney Able, Mario Zuniga Benavides
overview: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion, a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the U.S. border.

title: The Box
stars: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
overview: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

title: Elektra
stars: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
overview: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

title: The Guardian
stars: Kevin Costner, Ashton Kutcher, Sela Ward
overview: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

title: The Muppets
stars: Amy Adams, Jason Segel, Chris Cooper
overview: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

title: The One
stars: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo
overview: A rogue Multiverse agent goes on a manhunt for alternate versions of himself, getting stronger with each kill. Only the last version of himself, an LASD cop, can stop his crusade before he becomes "The One".

title: Beginners
stars: Ewan McGregor, Christopher Plummer, Mélanie Laurent
overview: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

title: The Duff
stars: Mae Whitman, Bella Thorne, Robbie Amell
overview: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

title: The X Files: I Want to Believe
stars: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Billy Connolly
overview: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

title: Sing Street
stars: Ferdia Walsh-Peelo, Aidan Gillen, Maria Doyle Kennedy
overview: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: Be Kind Rewind
stars: Jack Black, Yasiin Bey, Danny Glover
overview: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

title: Big Eyes
stars: Amy Adams, Christoph Waltz, Danny Huston
overview: A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

title: Knock Knock
stars: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas
overview: A devoted father helps two stranded young women who knock on his door, but his kind gesture turns into a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: Eddie the Eagle
stars: Taron Egerton, Hugh Jackman, Tom Costello
overview: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

title: It's Complicated
stars: Meryl Streep, Steve Martin, Alec Baldwin
overview: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

title: Killers
stars: Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Tom Selleck
overview: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

title: The Last House on the Left
stars: Garret Dillahunt, Monica Potter, Tony Goldwyn
overview: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

title: Nymphomaniac: Vol. II
stars: Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgård, Willem Dafoe
overview: The continuation of Joe's sexually dictated life delves into the darker aspects of her adulthood, obsessions and what led to her being in Seligman's care.

title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
stars: Milla Jovovich, Iain Glen, Ali Larter
overview: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

title: It Comes at Night
stars: Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott, Carmen Ejogo
overview: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

title: The Ritual
stars: Rafe Spall, Arsher Ali, Robert James-Collier
overview: A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Eastern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.

title: Disaster Movie
stars: Aaron Seltzer, Carmen Electra, Vanessa Lachey
overview: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

title: Selma
stars: David Oyelowo, Carmen Ejogo, Oprah Winfrey
overview: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

title: Chicken Little
stars: Zach Braff, Joan Cusack, Garry Marshall
overview: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
stars: Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen, Deepika Padukone
overview: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

title: The Circle
stars: Emma Watson, Tom Hanks, John Boyega
overview: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

title: The Heartbreak Kid
stars: Peter Farrelly, Ben Stiller, Michelle Monaghan
overview: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
stars: Megan Fox, Will Arnett, Tyler Perry
overview: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies: the mutant thugs Bebop and Rocksteady and the alien being Krang.

title: Martyrs
stars: Morjana Alaoui, Mylène Jampanoï, Catherine Bégin
overview: A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.

title: Pet Sematary
stars: Dennis Widmyer, Jason Clarke, Amy Seimetz
overview: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

title: War
stars: Jet Li, Jason Statham, Nadine Velazquez
overview: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

title: American Ultra
stars: Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart, Connie Britton
overview: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

title: Elephant
stars: Elias McConnell, Alex Frost, Eric Deulen
overview: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

title: Here Comes the Boom
stars: Kevin James, Salma Hayek, Henry Winkler
overview: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

title: Ali G Indahouse
stars: Sacha Baron Cohen, Emilio Rivera, Gina La Piana
overview: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

title: Biutiful
stars: Javier Bardem, Maricel Álvarez, Hanaa Bouchaib
overview: A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.

title: Trick 'r Treat
stars: Anna Paquin, Brian Cox, Dylan Baker
overview: Five interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: An everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank; a woman who loathes the night has to contend with her holiday-obsessed husband; and a mean old man meets his match with a demonic, supernatural trick-or-treater.

title: Skyline
stars: Greg Strause, Eric Balfour, Donald Faison
overview: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
stars: Lily James, Amanda Seyfried, Meryl Streep
overview: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.

title: Hitman: Agent 47
stars: Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware, Zachary Quinto
overview: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

title: Sweet November
stars: Keanu Reeves, Charlize Theron, Jason Isaacs
overview: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.

title: Good Luck Chuck
stars: Dane Cook, Jessica Alba, Dan Fogler
overview: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

title: Submarine
stars: Craig Roberts, Sally Hawkins, Paddy Considine
overview: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

title: Charlie's Angels
stars: Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott, Ella Balinska

title: Bandits
stars: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett

title: Isn't It Romantic
stars: Rebel Wilson, Liam Hemsworth, Adam Devine

title: Ajeossi
stars: Won Bin, Kim Sae-ron, Kim Tae-hoon

title: Dead Man Down

stars: Drake Bell, Leslie Nielsen, Sara Paxton

title: The Gift

title: The Forgotten

stars: Henry Thomas, Colin Hanks, Ben Foster

overview: A thousand years ago, one boy with a dream of becoming a great warrior is abducted with his sister and taken to a land far away from home. Thrown into a world where greed and injustice rule all, Bilal finds the courage to raise his voice and make a change. Inspired by true events, this is a story of a real hero who earned his remembrance in time and history.

stars: Michiel Huisman, Teresa Palmer, Sam Reid

overview: Ali Osman is living a quiet life after years of struggle, and tears. And he is slowly slipping into dementia. He made his peace with the horrible life he had and waiting for his final day ... See full summary »

overview: At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.

title: Student of the Year

While Frankie served time, James worked to turn his life around, got a steady job and began courting his former girlfriend Emily. Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go.

stars: Rachel Weisz, Jude Law, Anthony Hopkins

title: Brigsby Bear
stars: Kyle Mooney, Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Matt Walsh

title: Wakefield

title: The Hallow
stars: Joseph Mawle, Bojana Novakovic, Michael McElhatton

stars: Sergey Makovetskiy, Sergey Garmash, Apti Magamaev

Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.
